mapper.select: select dept_no as no, dept_name as name from sample_departments order by dept_no asc
select position_no as no, position_name as name from sample_positions order by position_no

select employee_id as id, employee_encrypt_password as encryptPassword, employee_name as name, employee_email as email, employee_dept_no as deptNo, employee_position_no as positionNo, employee_created_date as createdDate, employee_updated_date as updatedDate from sample_employees where employee_id = #{value}
select employee_id as id, employee_role_name as name from sample_employee_roles where employee_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into sample_employees (employee_id, employee_encrypt_password, employee_name, employee_email, employee_dept_no, employee_position_no, employee_created_date, employee_updated_date) values (#{id}, #{encryptPassword}, #{name}, #{email}, #{auth}, #{deptNo}, #{positionNo}, now(), now())
